column4: when trying to install a program I get an error saying "Only one software management tool is allowed to run at the same time" I have tried to restart and not opening anything except firefox to download the file again. Can anyone help me please?
Are you upgrading with apt-get or have synaptic open?
type "top" in the terminal to see if anyone's holding up the process
aptitude, synaptic, gdebi, anything that might be using the process, even though it appears dead
